successes.title: PLAYBULB candle - Color LED Flameless Candle with Mobile App
successes.description: With PLAYBULB X free App, PLAYBULB candle is a smart LED candle light that liberates our imagination over colors.

Pledges.description: Spread the candle light. Pledge $1 to help us send color and fun to the world.  We will keep you updated on the latest status of PLAYBULB candle.
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - ONE pcs of PLAYBULB candle (Unit retail price $16.99). Free shipping to the US. (Add $3 for international shipping outside the US)
REGULAR SPECIAL - ONE pcs of PLAYBULB candle (Unit retail price $16.99).  Free shipping to the US. (Add $3 for international shipping outside the US)
FINAL CALL - ONE pcs of PLAYBULB candle (Unit retail price $18.99). Free shipping to the US. (Add $3 for international shipping outside the US)
